meanings.definition: To remove frost or ice from a surface by melting or warming.
meanings.sent1: I am defrosting the car windshield with hot water.
meanings.sent2: She always defrosts the freezer before it gets too icy.
meanings.sent3: The sun is like a giant heater defrosting the world in the morning.
meanings.sent4: His warm smile defrosted her icy demeanor instantly.
meanings.sent5: The campfire slowly defrosting the frozen marshmallows was a mesmerizing sight.

meanings.definition: The process of thawing frozen food.
meanings.sent1: The defrosting of the chicken will take a few hours.
meanings.sent2: I always use the microwave for quick defrosting of meat.
meanings.sent3: The defrosting of the fridge revealed some forgotten ice cream.
meanings.sent4: The defrosting of the turkey was a race against time for Thanksgiving dinner.
meanings.sent5: The defrosting of the fish in the sink created a fishy smell in the kitchen.
